owlOS - terminal weather app

credits: Tran Dang Duat (trandangduat.github.io/weather-app/)

favicon: freepik.com - icon by Aranagraphics

!f <LOCATION>: displays weather informations of <LOCATION>

!clt: clears the terminal

colorscheme: Folke Lemaitre - tokyonight (github.com/folke/tokyonight.nvim)
